subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lowry, second on the Raptors in scoring, was inactive, but DeMar DeRozan led Toronto with 23 points as the Knicks lost their third in a row.
snippet: Lowry, second on the Raptors in scoring, was inactive, but DeMar DeRozan led Toronto with 23 points as the Knicks lost their third in a row.
